metaTitle: JuanCamiloQHz | Software Developer, Entrepreneur, CTO at Vibra
metaDescription: JuanCamiloQHz is a Software Developer, Entrepreneur, currently working as CTO at Vibra.la. He is passionate about new technologies and the web. He is a self-taught software engineer and entrepreneur. He is a graduate of the EAFIT University of MedellÃ­n with a Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering, also graduated of MBA from the same university.
iDo: I craft things for the web.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.1: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Juan Camilo Quintero! I'm a Software Engineer with a great passion and curiosity for Science, New Technologies, Engineering, Design, Arts, and Great Artistic Shows. I currently live in MedellÃ­n, Colombia.
about-me.2: I've always been fascinated by the internet and how it can impact people's and businesses'. I've spent the past 6 years working and developing different projects and companies, with an emphasis on the best user experience and performance. I'm currently the Co Founder and CTO at <1>Vibra.la</1>, a real estate startup that hopes to change the way people find, buy and sell homes by bringing the best tools to the real estate industry.
about-me.3: In addition to my work, I love to learn new things, and I'm always looking for new challenges. In my free time, you can usually find me learning about New Technologies, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science. I find that the best way to learn is to do, so I'm always looking for new projects and challenges to work on.
about-me.4: I created this website to keep track of my projects, ideas, and learnings in one place and share them with the world. Through this platform, I hope to inspire others to create and learn new things. I hope you find it useful and interesting!
about-me.5: If you have any questions or want to learn more about me, feel free to contact me through my social media or by my <2>contact section</2>. If you're interested in reading some articles please check my <5>blog</5>.

featured-one-title: Who am I, and why have I created this website?

professionDescription.1: I'm a Software Engineer living in MedellÃ­n, Colombia with 6 years of experience developing web applications. I have developed many type of projects, from Social Marketplaces to Ecommerce platforms.
professionDescription.2: I'm very passionate about the latest technologies, perfect designs interfaces, as well as excellent user experience. My Focus is to deliver high-quality, reliable, and scalable solutions for my clients.
